Home.title: Welcome to City Review
Home.description: City Review is the best website for sharing your favorite locations and discovering your next one!
Home.description2: If you want to explore the world or just your city, you are in the right place. We have the best reviews for you made by people like you who love to travel.           We have reviews of the best places in the world, the best restaurants, the best bars, parks and much more. You can also share your experiences with us and help other people to have a great time.
Home.lastLocations: Here are the last locations uploaded by our users
